Control Name: 5.4.1 Formal DevOps approach to building and maintaining software in this workload was adopted.The DevOps approach increases the organization's ability to rapidly address security concerns without waiting for a longer planning and testing cycle of traditional waterfall model. Key attributes are: automation, close integration of infra and dev teams, testability and reliability and repeatability of deployments.
